channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Contextual Related Posts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Contextual Related Posts

item.title: CVE-2023-0252|2024-08-02T05:02:44.083Z -- unknown -- contextual%20related%20posts
item.description: The Contextual Related Posts WordPress plugin before 3.3.1 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
